game.name: THE GUARDIANS
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Aegis Carrier Fleet merges human skill with unmatched AI control, IRRA. Control the most advanced aircraft into lethal battle zones, where your squadrons act with precision to secure decisive victories.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Aegis Carrier Fleet merges human skill with unmatched AI control, IRRA. Control the most advanced aircraft into lethal battle zones, where your squadrons act with precision to secure decisive victories.
